description: Create a file in this repository.
name: create_file

author.description: If omitted this will be filled in with committer information. If passed, you must specify both a name and email. Expected format: FirstName LastName <email@address>

branch.description: Branch to create the commit on. Defaults to the default branch of the repository

committer.description: If no information is given the authenticated user's information will be used. You must specify both a name and email. Expected format: FirstName LastName <email@address>

content.description: The actual data in the file.

encoding.description: Specify if the input content is encoded.

path.description: Path of the file in the repository.
